resources.string:
To add a new sample, just press the big plus button.

To edit the fields, all you need to do is tap them. Remember to press the done key (Checkmark on Android) if you wish to save the item.

To delete a sample, just swipe the sample away. If you shutdown the app, the undo button will not be able to recover your samples!

Currently, the app technically only supports Dialysis. So the icon is a bucket and all the parameters relate to Dialysis!
This is a project that I\'m going to be working on. :D
Icons from: https://icons8.com/icon/20907/Bitbucket and www.flaticon.com (Notepad by Madebyoliver)
